EmailTemplate.name: 2018_Weekly_Email.2018_11_PHX_GreenFlag_Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Learn How NASCAR Driver Brad Keselowski Gets To The Green Flag
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Learn How NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski Gets To The Green Flag Every Week. Honeywell Invites You to a Special Demonstration of the Primus Elite Cockpit Upgrade on Brad's Lear 45 Date Thursday, November 8, 2018
Time Lunch: 12:30 PM Demonstrations: 1:30 - 5 PM
Honeywell Phoenix Hangar, 3301 E Air Lane Road
Joey Meier, Brad Keselowski's chief pilot and race spotter, will demonstrate the Primus Elite cockpit upgrade on the Lear 45 and why it's critical to Brad's racing schedule. The demonstration will cover all Primus Elite certified aircraft: Global Express, Falcon 900EX/C, Legacy 600, Lear 40/45, Citation 550/560, Dornier 328, and Gulfstream GIV/GIV-SP/GV.
Lunch will be available!
If attending, RSVP by November 5 to Ed.Borger@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Ed.Borger@Honeywell.com]]>
